subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Surfing
Golf
Synchronized Swimming
lead_paragraph: The surf was up in South Africa for Round 2 of the Billabong Pro Jeffreys Bay surfing event, and umbrellas were up in France for the first round of the Evian Masters golf tournament, a women’s event.
